ygData.subject: Re: Gems!
ygData.msgSnippet: I just sat at the Lake Rathe zone in SK with my enchanter and played gems last night.  I learned many secrets... I am the gems master! :P It s awesome when
ygData.messageBody:
I just sat at the Lake Rathe zone in SK with my enchanter and played
gems last night. I learned many secrets... I am the gems master! :P

It's awesome when playing low level casters that have to stare at the
spell book to med. It works in the spell book! Woohoo!

Can't wait for the multiplayer version! :)

~Beatdrop


--- In eqbards@y..., "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@m...> wrote:
> I logged on this morning for my daily 40 mins of pre-work bard
leveling...
> and all i did was sit at the bank in fv and play gems. I'm
addicted.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Michael [mailto:jackal@v...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2001 1:09 PM
> > To: eqbards@y...
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Gems!
> >
> >
> > Heh there is a way where anybody can go non stop.
> >
> > Naeeldar
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@m...>
> > To: <eqbards@y...>
> > Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2001 2:18 PM
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gems!
> >
> >
> > > ROFL
> > > No, honestly, I just suck!
> > >
> > > > -----Original Message-----
